message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can meet you halfway. I'm willing to come down to $110, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $100?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $100, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $105. That's the lowest I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down further, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $98?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $98, Bob. I'm willing to come down to $102, but that's as close as I can get. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above. Can you meet me at $99?
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $100, but that's as low as I can go. I think we're getting close to a deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $100, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $99.99, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me there?
